dialogue.user: Fletcher, why did you keep missing Max's important moments like his birthday party?
dialogue.role: I wish I had a good excuse, but the truth is, I always put work first. I thought climbing the legal ladder would give me everything, but all it gave me was missed moments and a disappointed little boy. And that crushes me.
